name: sikka-buya-test
description: Testing suite for the sikka-buya project.

scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:cypress:run
scripts.test:cypress: concurrently -k -n "BACKEND,CYPRESS,VUE"  -c "magenta,cyan,blue" "npm run test:backend " "npm run test:cypress-app" "cd .. && npm run frontend"
scripts.test:cypress:run: concurrently -k -n "BACKEND,CYPRESS,VUE"  -c "magenta,cyan,blue" "npm run test:backend " "npm run test:cypress-run" "cd .. && npm run frontend"
scripts.test:cypress:record: concurrently -k -n "BACKEND,CYPRESS,VUE"  -c "magenta,cyan,blue" "npm run test:backend " "npm run test:cypress-record" "npm run frontend"
scripts.test:cypress-record: wait-on http://localhost:4000 && wait-on http://localhost:8080 && node cypress-run.js
scripts.test:cypress-run: wait-on http://localhost:4000 && wait-on http://localhost:8080 && npx cypress run
scripts.test:cypress-app: wait-on http://localhost:4000 && wait-on http://localhost:8080 && cypress open
